modelrailway.railsystem

Class BaseRail

  • java.lang.Object
    • modelrailway.BaseObject
      • modelrailway.railsystem.BaseRail
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseRailPassable, BufferStop

    public abstract class BaseRail
extends BaseObject
    This class is the base class for all rails. It contains common informations.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Remo Doerig
